lawName: New buildings construction allowed in high and very high fire hazard areas
Minimum buffer zone for construction near forested land
Minimum distance of protection zone from the property boundary (when adjoining forest, scrubland, or natural pastures)
Construction or expansion in low fire hazard areas with protective strip distance of
Minimum buffer zone for construction near agricultural land (very low fire risk)
Protective buffer zone measured from exterior wall
Protection zone distance measured from exterior wall of the building
Need to adopt measures for containing potential ignition sources
Protection strip measured from the exterior wall of the building
Adoption of measures to contain potential ignition sources
Requirement for favorable opinion from CMDF
Secondary or primary network areas can be counted towards minimum protection strip distance
